verses.verse: וְיִפְתָּ֣ח <S%H3316><s%> Now Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֗י <S%H1569><s%> the Gileadite הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> was a mighty man חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> and he [was] the son אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> ess זוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> commit fornication וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> begat גִּלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> and Gilead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִפְתָּֽח׃ <S%H3316><s%> Jephthah

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife גִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> And Gilead's ל֖וֹ בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> him sons וַיִּגְדְּל֨וּ <S%H1431><s%> grew up בְֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> and his wife's וַיְגָרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1644><s%> and they thrust out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִפְתָּ֗ח <S%H3316><s%> Jephthah וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and said לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִנְחַ֣ל <S%H5157><s%> unto him Thou shalt not inherit בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> in our father's כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> for thou [art] the son אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman אַחֶ֖רֶת <S%H312><s%> of a strange אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <S%H1272><s%> fled יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> Then Jephthah מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brethren וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land ט֑וֹב <S%H2897><s%> of Tob וַיִּֽתְלַקְּט֤וּ <S%H3950><s%> and there were gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> to Jephthah אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> men רֵיקִ֔ים <S%H7386><s%> vain וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> and went out עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with פ

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came מִיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> And it came to pass in process of time וַיִּלָּחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> made war בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> against Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נִלְחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> made war בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And it was so that when the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead לָקַ֥חַת <S%H3947><s%> to fetch אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִפְתָּ֖ח <S%H3316><s%> Jephthah מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2897><s%> of Tob

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said לְיִפְתָּ֔ח <S%H3316><s%> unto Jephthah לְכָ֕ה <S%H1980><s%> Come וְהָיִ֥יתָה <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֖נוּ לְקָצִ֑ין <S%H7101><s%> and be our captain וְנִֽלָּחֲמָ֖ה <S%H3898><s%> that we may fight בִּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> with the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah לְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you שְׂנֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H8130><s%> Did not ye hate אוֹתִ֔י <S%H853><s%> וַתְּגָרְשׁ֖וּנִי <S%H1644><s%> me and expel מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> court אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> me out of my father's וּמַדּ֜וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> have you בָּאתֶ֤ם <S%H935><s%> come אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me עַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צַ֥ר <S%H6862><s%> adversary לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> said זִקְנֵ֨י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders גִלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִפְתָּ֗ח <S%H3316><s%> unto Jephthah לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> this עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> have now שַׁ֣בְנוּ <S%H7725><s%> Therefore we turn again אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְהָלַכְתָּ֣ <S%H1980><s%> to thee now that thou mayest go עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> us וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֖ <S%H3898><s%> with us and fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְהָיִ֤יתָ <S%H1961><s%> and become לָּ֙נוּ֙ לְרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> and be our head לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִפְתָּ֜ח <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders גִלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מְשִׁיבִ֨ים <S%H7725><s%> If ye bring me home again אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <S%H3898><s%> to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְנָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> deliver יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> them before אָנֹכִ֕י <S%H595><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> band

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> said זִקְנֵֽי־ <S%H2205><s%> And the elders גִלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִפְתָּ֑ח <S%H3316><s%> unto Jephthah יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> be witness בֵּֽינוֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H996><s%> between אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not כִדְבָרְךָ֖ <S%H1697><s%> not so according to thy words כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> between us if we do

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> Then Jephthah עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> with the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> made הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people אוֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> him head וּלְקָצִ֑ין <S%H7101><s%> and captain וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> uttered יִפְתָּ֧ח <S%H3316><s%> over them and Jephthah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבָרָ֛יו <S%H1697><s%> all his words לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> in Mizpeh פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יִפְתָּח֙ <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לִּ֣י וָלָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that בָ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> What hast thou to do with me that thou art come אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> against me to fight בְּאַרְצִֽי׃ <S%H776><s%> common

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> answered מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> unto the messengers יִפְתָּ֗ח <S%H3316><s%> of Jephthah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because לָקַ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took away יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Because Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצִי֙ <S%H776><s%> my land בַּעֲלוֹת֣וֹ <S%H5927><s%> when they came up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt מֵאַרְנ֥וֹן <S%H769><s%> from Arnon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַיַּבֹּ֖ק <S%H2999><s%> even unto Jabbok וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> and unto Jordan וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now הָשִׁ֥יבָה <S%H7725><s%> now therefore restore those [lands] again אֶתְהֶ֖ן <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> peaceably

וַיּ֥וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> But יִפְתָּ֑ח <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said ל֔וֹ כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יִפְתָּ֑ח <S%H3316><s%> Jephthah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor לָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took not away יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> nor the land בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for בַּעֲלוֹתָ֣ם <S%H5927><s%> came up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> But when Israel בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> through the wilderness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> unto the Red וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came קָדֵֽשָׁה׃ <S%H6946><s%> to Kadesh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Then Israel מַלְאָכִ֣ים ׀ <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶלֶךְ֩ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֱד֨וֹם ׀ <S%H123><s%> of Edom לֵאמֹ֜ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֶעְבְּרָה־ <S%H5674><s%> Let me I pray thee pass through נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <S%H776><s%> thy land וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> would not hearken מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> but the king אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king מוֹאָ֛ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab שָׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> [thereto] And in like manner they sent וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֑ה <S%H14><s%> but he would וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> not [consent] and Israel בְּקָדֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H6946><s%> in Kadesh

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> through the wilderness וַיָּ֜סָב <S%H5437><s%> and compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> and came מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> east side שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> east side לְאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּן <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side אַרְנ֑וֹן <S%H769><s%> of Arnon וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> but came בִּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> not within the border מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַרְנ֖וֹן <S%H769><s%> for Arnon גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> [was] the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And Israel מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to סִיח֥וֹן <S%H5511><s%> unto Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel נַעְבְּרָה־ <S%H5674><s%> unto him Let us pass נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please בְאַרְצְךָ֖ <S%H776><s%> we pray thee through thy land עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> into מְקוֹמִֽי׃ <S%H4725><s%> my place

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came יִפְתָּ֣ח <S%H3316><s%> And Jephthah הַמִּצְפָּה֮ <S%H4709><s%> to Mizpeh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּיתוֹ֒ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בִתּוֹ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and behold his daughter יֹצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> came out לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <S%H7125><s%> to meet בְתֻפִּ֖ים <S%H8596><s%> him with timbrels וּבִמְחֹל֑וֹת <S%H4246><s%> and with dances וְרַק֙ <S%H7535><s%> but הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> now she יְחִידָ֔ה <S%H3173><s%> and she [was his] only child אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> had ל֥וֹ מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> besides בֵּ֖ן <S%H1121><s%> beside her he had neither son אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> nor בַֽת׃ <S%H1323><s%> daughter

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִרְאוֹת֨וֹ <S%H7200><s%> And it came to pass when he saw אוֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּקְרַ֣ע <S%H7167><s%> her that he rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֗יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֲהָ֤הּ <S%H162><s%> Alas בִּתִּי֙ <S%H1323><s%> my daughter הַכְרֵ֣עַ <S%H3766><s%> me very הִכְרַעְתִּ֔נִי <S%H3766><s%> low וְאַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you הָיִ֣יתְ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּעֹֽכְרָ֑י <S%H5916><s%> and thou art one of them that trouble וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> i פָּצִ֤יתִי־ <S%H6475><s%> me for I have opened פִי֙ <S%H6310><s%> my mouth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and I אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> and I cannot לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> go back

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> unto him My father פָּצִ֤יתָה <S%H6475><s%> [if] thou hast opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6310><s%> thy mouth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> do לִ֔י כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> to me according to that which יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> hath proceeded מִפִּ֑יךָ <S%H6310><s%> out of thy mouth אַחֲרֵ֡י <S%H310><s%> forasmuch אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> hath taken לְךָ֙ יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD נְקָמ֛וֹת <S%H5360><s%> vengeance מֵאֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H341><s%> for thee of thine enemies מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [even] of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her אָבִ֔יהָ <S%H1><s%> unto her father יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> be done לִּ֖י הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> Let this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַרְפֵּ֨ה <S%H7503><s%> for me let me alone מִמֶּ֜נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> two חֳדָשִׁ֗ים <S%H2320><s%> months וְאֵֽלְכָה֙ <S%H1980><s%> along וְיָרַדְתִּ֣י <S%H3381><s%> and down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains וְאֶבְכֶּה֙ <S%H1058><s%> and bewail עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because בְּתוּלַ֔י <S%H1331><s%> my virginity אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I [וְרַעִיתִי כ] (וְרֵעֹותָֽי׃ <S%H7474><s%> fellow ק)

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֵ֔כִי <S%H1980><s%> Go וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent her away אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> [for] two חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> months וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> left הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְרֵ֣עוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H7464><s%> with her companions וַתֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> and bewailed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because בְּתוּלֶ֖יהָ <S%H1331><s%> her virginity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הֶהָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> became מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass at the end שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> of two חֳדָשִׁ֗ים <S%H2320><s%> months וַתָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> that she returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her אָבִ֔יהָ <S%H1><s%> unto her father וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> who did לָ֔הּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִדְר֖וֹ <S%H5088><s%> with her [according] to his vow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָדָ֑ר <S%H5087><s%> which he had vowed וְהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָדְעָ֣ה <S%H3045><s%> and she knew אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> no man וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became חֹ֖ק <S%H2706><s%> And it was a custom בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3117><s%> days יָמִ֗ימָה <S%H3117><s%> days תֵּלַ֙כְנָה֙ <S%H1980><s%> went בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> [That] the daughters יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְתַנּ֕וֹת <S%H8567><s%> to lament לְבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יִפְתָּ֖ח <S%H3316><s%> of Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֑י <S%H1569><s%> the Gileadite אַרְבַּ֥עַת <S%H702><s%> four יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> yearly בַּשָּׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> in a year ס
